mapper.select: select sku.id as sku_id,spu.id as spu_id,tm.id as tm_id,img.id as img_id,attr.shxm_mch ,CONCAT(val.shxzh,val.shxzh_mch) as shxzh_mch ,sku.*,spu.*,img.* from t_mall_sku sku, t_mall_product spu, t_mall_trade_mark tm, t_mall_sku_attr_value av, t_mall_attr attr, t_mall_value val, t_mall_product_image img where sku.shp_id = spu.Id AND tm.id = spu.pp_id AND sku.Id = av.sku_id and av.shxm_id = attr.id and av.shxzh_id = val.id and spu.id = img.shp_id and sku.id = #{sku_id}

where spu.Id =sku.shp_id AND sku.Id = av.sku_id AND spu.flbh1 = tmc.flbh1 AND tmc.pp_id = tm.Id and spu.pp_id = tm.id and spu.flbh2 = #{class_2_id} ${sql} ${order}
